module.name: class_of_product_structure
module.keywords: module, individual, product, relationship, structure, process plant

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module to record:

ul.li: classes of composition relationship, and the decomposition of a class of product into component classes of product ;
classes of connection relationship, and connections between classes of product;
classes of product that are used to make a class of connection;
classes of containment relationship, and relationships between classes of product and classes of container.

li.p: existence of a class of product;
li.note: This capability is provided by the referenced Class_of_product application module.

li.p: class of decomposition relationship, and the decomposition of a class of product into component classes of product;
li.note: This capability is provided by the referenced Class_of_composition_of_product application module.

li.p: class of connection relationship, and connection between classes of product;
li.note: This capability is provided by the referenced Class_of_connection_of_product application module.

li.p: class of usage of a product in a connection, and usage of a class of product in a class of connection;
li.note: This capability is provided by the referenced Class_of_involvement_of_product_in_connection application module.

li.p: class of containment relationship, and containment of a class of product by a class of container.
li.note: This capability is provided by the referenced Class_of_containment_of_product application module.

li.p: the structure of an individual product;
li.note: The structure of an individual product is within the scope of the Individual_product_structure application module.

li.p: the involvement of classes of product, classes of documents, classes of people and classes of organisation in a class of activity.
li.note: The involvement of classes of product, classes of documents, classes of people and classes of organisation in a class of activity is within the scope of the Class_of_involvement_in_activity application module.

uof.name: class_of_product_structure
uof.description: The class_of_product_structure UOF provides the ability to record information about classes of product and their structure.
